title: Bug 123368[SPMLinux WS]Height of item area can't revert
description: Bug 123368[SPMLinux WS]Height of item area can't revert
OB: Details:Height of item area can't revertSetp:1.Insert a label and input some words.2.Modify the label size to 10cm.3.Undo that or set it to 10point.Actual result:10cm is bigger than 10point, when I undo it, words is revert to 10point, but the area of the label can't revert.
